sections.heading: securities; substitute; when required
sections.text: If the interest on any security pledged as provided in section 8-209 remains unpaid for thirty days after maturity, the trust company shall substitute other securities therefor.SourceLaws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. XVIII, § 14, p. 722;C.S.1922, § 8076;C.S.1929,

8-217.Pledged securities; substitute; when required.

If the interest on any security pledged as provided in section 8-209 remains unpaid for thirty days after maturity, the trust company shall substitute other securities therefor.

SourceLaws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. XVIII, § 14, p. 722;C.S.1922, § 8076;C.S.1929, § 8-214;Laws 1933, c. 18, § 80, p. 176;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 8-214;R.S.1943, § 8-217;Laws 1993, LB 81, § 31.
